results.title: Care of St. Christopher's
results.brief_description: A typical day at St. Christopher’s Home for the Children of Railwaymen, at Derby. This establishment cares for children whose parents work in transport but are unable for some reason to provide a proper home for them. How the staff of the Home look after the well-being of the children and provide the family atmosphere and individual interest which are so badly needed by the homeless child.

results.title: Care of art materials
results.brief_description: This film will be useful in primary classes in art education, but it will also be useful to any one using art materials. Its primary purpose is to promote greater care and interest in the use of the art tools commonly found in the school class-room in grades 1 to 4.

results.title: Care and use of hand tools. Pt. III: chisels
results.creator_credit: Plomb Tool Co and Signal Corps Production
results.brief_description: The film describes the uses and types of chisels. General care and handling positions are carefully illustrated, cutting edges are demonstrated and bevelling is explained. A training film.

results.title: Care and maintenance of building plant
results.creator_credit: Basic Films, John Taylor and John Rhodes
results.brief_description: The film emphasises the necessity for conserving resources by maintaining plant at a high level of efficiency. Examples of neglect and some of the major repair work required because of the neglect of day-to-day maintenance are shown. The need for operators to realise their responsibility for keeping a machine in order is stressed. While every machine has its own maintenance routine, the simple rules common to all machines are demonstrated.

results.title: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation
results.brief_description: A refresher course for people with First Aid training on cardiopulmonary resuscitation. An excellent resource for Occupational Health and Safety Officers which demonstrates in clear and concise steps, the correct procedures for cardiopulmonary resuscitation on an adult. There is a simulated workplace accident which highlights the importance of following correct procedures. Many of the techniques are demonstrated by the use of a resuscitation dummy.

results.title: Cardio funk aerobics at the Dome with Marcus Irwin
results.creator_credit: J T V Productions and Mark Thorn
results.brief_description: Since Marcus Irwin introduced ‘Cardio Funk’ to Australia in 1989 it has become one of the most popular forms of Aerobics. Marcus and his fluorescent entourage begin this intermediate workout with a ten minute instructional segment and will guide through a routine which includes a warm up to prepare your body for the workout, a section aimed at co-ordinating, your arms and legs and gradually raises your workout level, a cardiovascular section, a ‘Jammin’ segment which combines the various steps and finally a ‘cool down’ to end your session.

results.title: Carcinoma of the stomach: gastrectomy
results.creator_credit: Mayo Clinic Film Library, William H ReMine and Waltman Walters
results.brief_description: Shows radical subtotal and radical total gastrectomy with removal of omentum, lymph nodes and spleen. A preliminary discussion of advances in treatment of carcinoma of the stomach is given by the authors.
